name: Stale Bread Crumbs
description: Rock-hard crumbs that have seen better days. Better than starving, but only just barely.

name: Turnip
description: A humble root vegetable. Not the most appetizing, but it will keep you alive through the harsh winter months.

name: Venison Haunch
description: Fresh meat from a forest deer. Rich and satisfying, this will restore strength to weary travelers. Best roasted over an open flame.

name: Honey-Glazed Ham
description: A fine cut of pork, glazed with rare wildflower honey. The kind of meal served in noble halls, rich enough to satisfy even the heartiest appetite.

name: Moonberry Pie
description: Baked with rare moonberries that only grow in blessed groves. The pie glows faintly with ethereal light and is said to grant visions of the future.

name: Phoenix Egg Omelette
description: Prepared from the egg of a phoenix, this dish radiates warmth and vitality. Consuming it fills the body with rejuvenating fire that can heal grievous wounds.

name: Kraken Steak
description: A massive cut from the legendary sea beast. The meat is tough but incredibly nourishing, said to grant temporary resistance to drowning and deep-sea pressure.
